comment: Simply - The best professor I've had.  Makes you want to learn. Sorry he is retiring.  I would have loved taking another class from him.

Interesting, inspiring, funny...quite possibly the best teacher I've ever had, and I've taken enough classes to have earned a Master's Degree (upper 3's GPA). It's a crime that he doesn't teach at Kennesaw anymore. He'll make you work, but he really inspires you to want to learn, and to have set high standards for youself. Loved him.
awesome class w/ an awesome prof.. would totally recommend him but rumor has it that fall 06 is his last semester.  If you didnâ€™t get a chance to take him, you really missed out!

Great guy. His jokes get a little corny from time to time but he's great. The information he teaches is acutally helpful in real life. Read the book. He gets on you bad if he can tell that the class hasn't been reading. Tests are tricky. He lets you explain your answers if there were questions on the test you weren't sure about. Overall, he's good.
He knows what he's talking about and makes sure you do too.  He does all he can do to make sure you learn the information and therefor makes it easy to do well on the exams.

AWESOME professor!! Very willing to help students and is very clear.  Gives 2 projects that boost grade. Tests are pretty hard, but it's a very good class.  You learn alot of useful things about the "real" world.
very nice teacher, clear and helpful. But his exams are really tricky.

Mr. Schlact is the reason why i went to school regularly. Every day that I had him I could not wait for class to start. He is cleverly funny, intellectual, selfless, helping, and most important of all: honest.  He taught us so much valuable information so we could use it ethically to succeed when we  grow older. Thank you Mr. Schlact - mr. ahn

The best teacher I ever had. The first teacher that has made me want to come to class and listen to the lectures and makes it very interesting and worth your time to attend. Every piece of info he presents to you will be useful somehow later on down the road. If you have to chance take this teacher!
awesome teacher! doesnt just lecture, makes sure you understand what hes explaining, let you use a cheat sheet on exams. has a project but it is very simple! take him!!!
Very great teacher! He really wants everyone to learn. He has an awesome personality and his class makes you want to come. I would highly recommend this teacher.
He is the best teacher at kennesaw. You learn and want to be there for class!
No Comments
This is the greatest professor I've ever had in my past 3 years of college.
Take him before he retires. He is the best when it comes to law and he wants you to learn. Very interesting class.
Amazing teacher! doesnt just teach book stuff, teaches valuable and helpful info for everyday life.
Hands down the best professor in the University System. He understands how to teach...which is very rare these days.
Very nice guy. I would love to take another class with him and he is so helpful.  I think he is the greatest professor at this school!
the best professor I ever had
Nice Guy. Gets you interested and uses lots of examples and cases.  Cheat Sheet on test.  YOu can fit all your notes
